title: rsincognito
author: rsincognito
content: Good day, it’s been about a year that I’ve been searching for one of these bars, if anyone has a link on one and an offer price please let me know. Thank you so much.  If I have to I might be willing to add one  10 year anniversary denarium which has 1gold oz in the deal as trade-in if some one is willing to part with a 2018 denarium gold bar , pics below thank you Looking for 2018 denarius 2oz gold bar wallet Pic of item : https://ibb.co/PGrCnhxI’m willing to use a 10 anniversary denarium 1oz gold bar plaque towards a trade plus btc for the item im looking for Pic of Item I have for trade-in, it’s #4 of #100: https://ibb.co/f0WXsrqStack Sats

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on August 02, 2023, 07:30:03 PMGood day, it’s been about a year that I’ve been searching for one of these bars, if anyone has a link on one and an offer price please let me know. Thank you so much.  If I have to I might be willing to add one  10 year anniversary denarium which has 1gold oz in the deal as trade-in if some one is willing to part with a 2018 denarium gold bar , pics below thank you Looking for 2018 denarius 2oz gold bar wallet Pic of item : https://ibb.co/PGrCnhxI’m willing to use a 10 anniversary denarium 1oz gold bar plaque towards a trade plus btc for the item im looking for Pic of Item I have for trade-in, it’s #4 of #100: https://ibb.co/f0WXsrqStack Sats As you have not got any within a year you may search on google and try to buy from the search result. I think you may get your desired one. I have searched and go several result based on the search and seems the same as you have mentioned. And also opened a link and saw the buy option.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Good luck with your search. I have only seen pictures of this bar; never up for sale. Definitely the best looking bar out there IMO

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on August 04, 2023, 11:24:55 PMGood luck with your search. I have only seen pictures of this bar; never up for sale. Definitely the best looking bar out there IMOI feel the same. Generally not the biggest fan of Denarium but man, what an amazing bar. And generally even 2oz silver items are rare, but gold even more so.And a highroller item for sure - how much was the load for these? - I don't see it on the photo.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: If I recal I was offered one straight from the manufacture for I think $3,850 back when gold was $1,200 an oz.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on August 04, 2023, 11:24:55 PMGood luck with your search. I have only seen pictures of this bar; never up for sale. Definitely the best looking bar out there IMOThat’s what I’m saying, I keep a steady look out for one.
